Articles.Content: July 4th, 2013. I have ventured further than ever before. And in doing so, have found many relics of the past. I have even found a comment from March 29th, 2012! However, I am running low on supplies and am heading out soon. But there's so much more to discover! So many relics of the past, all at my fingertips. Sometimes I think that I don't want to leave. With all of this knowledge at my fingertips, who could blame me? I think that I will stay....
